biography.value:
Brynn Metheney

When a zaratan is summoned from the Elemental Plane of Earth, the ground rises up to take the shape of a hulking, armored reptile. A zaratan's steps trigger shock waves severe enough to level structures. It expresses its rage through trumpeting calls and the occasional boulder or blast of debris it spews from its cavernous maw. If seriously injured, a zaratan retracts its appendages to gain shelter beneath its impervious shell, biding its time until it recovers and can resume its march.

details.environment: Desert, Forest, Grassland, Hill, Mountain, Underdark

description.value: The zaratan makes one Bite attack and one Stomp attack.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+17]]{+17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 28 ([[/damage 4d8 + 10 type=force]]) damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+17]]{+17} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 26 ([[/damage 3d10 + 10 type=thunder]]) damage.
Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+17]]{+17} to hit, range 120 ft./240 ft., one target. Hit: 31 ([[/damage 6d8 + 10 type=force]]) damage.

The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save ability=dexterity dc=25]] saving throw. A creature takes 33 ([[/damage 6d10 type=bludgeoning]]) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked &Reference[condition=prone].
If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

activation.condition: If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

description.value: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Earth-Shaking Movement).

After moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan sends a shock wave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes &Reference[rule=difficultterrain]{difficult terrain} for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground that is @status[concentration||concentrating] must succeed on a [[/save ability=constitution dc=25]] saving throw or the creature's @status[concentration] is broken. The shock wave deals 100 thunder damage to all structures in contact with the ground in the area. If a creature is near a structure that collapses, the creature might be buried; a creature within half the distance of the structure's height must make a [[/save ability=dexterity dc=25]] saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 17 ([[/damage 5d6 type=bludgeoning]]) damage, is knocked &Reference[condition=prone], and is trapped in the rubble. A trapped creature is &Reference[condition=restrained], requiring a successful [[/save ability=strength dc=20]] (&Reference[skill=Athletics]) check as an action to escape. Another creature within 5 feet of the buried creature can use its action to clear rubble and grant advantage on the check. If three creatures use their actions in this way, the check is an automatic success. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall &Reference[condition=prone] or become trapped.
The zaratan makes one Stomp attack.
The zaratan moves up to its speed.
The zaratan makes one Spit Rock attack.

The zaratan retracts into its shell. Until it takes its Emerge action, it has resistance to all damage, and it is &Reference[condition=restrained]. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Revitalize or Emerge action.
The zaratan can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell. It regains 52 ([[/r 5d20]]) hit points. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Emerge action.
The zaratan emerges from its shell and makes one Spit Rock attack. It can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell.

The zaratan can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The zaratan regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

  • @UUID[Actor.nYbCCFfzm7nxPZK9.Item.hjaniZBd2T5kJ031]{Stomp}
  • @UUID[Actor.nYbCCFfzm7nxPZK9.Item.mRaN5IUoE1UHVxZr]{Move}
  • @UUID[Actor.nYbCCFfzm7nxPZK9.Item.SEvmDzq2Eb8cNFzo]{Spit}
  • @UUID[Actor.nYbCCFfzm7nxPZK9.Item.T5Zt95eu4kQYX3PX]{Retract}
  • @UUID[Actor.nYbCCFfzm7nxPZK9.Item.c6vmoZVarncbPxPb]{Revitalize}
  • @UUID[Actor.nYbCCFfzm7nxPZK9.Item.KcqvvKyEbdlvc1ip]{Emerge}
